Name: Sausage Hunter
About the game: A kitten armed with a Blaster tries to catch a magic sausage. He will have to overcome many obstacles. Hordes of enemies also want to take possession of the sausage. This will be an epic adventure! You will find: - hand drawn graphics - exciting levels - puzzles - pleasant music Go get the sausage!
